nl.tue.geometrycore.graphs.simple

Class SimpleVertex<TGeom extends OrientedGeometry<TGeom>,TVertex extends SimpleVertex<TGeom,TVertex,TEdge>,TEdge extends SimpleEdge<TGeom,TVertex,TEdge>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.BaseGeometry<Vector>
      • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.Vector
        • nl.tue.geometrycore.graphs.simple.SimpleVertex<TGeom,TVertex,TEdge>
  • Type Parameters:
    TGeom - The geometry of an edge, must inherit from OrientedGeometry
    TVertex - The class of a vertex
    TEdge - The class of an edge
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryConvertable<Vector>

    public abstract class SimpleVertex<TGeom extends OrientedGeometry<TGeom>,TVertex extends SimpleVertex<TGeom,TVertex,TEdge>,TEdge extends SimpleEdge<TGeom,TVertex,TEdge>>
extends Vector
    Class to represent a vertex in a simple edge-list implementation of a graph.
